channel.title: design patterns on Xizhi Zhu
channel.description: Recent content in design patterns on Xizhi Zhu

item.title: Design Patterns in Kotlin: Behavioral Patterns
item.description: Gang of Four’s Behavioral Patterns describe the way of communications between objects.

item.title: Design Patterns in Kotlin: Structural Patterns
item.description: Gang of Four’s Structural Patterns describe the way of composing classes and objects to form larger structures.

item.title: Design Patterns in Kotlin: Creational Patterns
item.description: Gang of Four’s Creational Patterns describe the way of creating and initializing objects.
